name: Harima
aura: Increase Ally  in Arena battles by 80

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 25% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all other enemies for 2 turns if this attack is critical.
skills.name: Debasement
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +15%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit decreases the target’s DEF by 5% (Stacks up to 30%). Each hit also increases this Champion’s DEF by 5% (Stacks up to 100%). 

Instantly activates the Celestial Awe skill if this skill kills an enemy.
skills.name: Purgative Punishment
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. This debuff cannot be blocked or resisted if the target Champion is from the Demonspawn Faction.
skills.name: Celestial Awe
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Enemy Ignore DEF effects are decreased by 50%. 

Champions from the Demonspawn Faction cannot inflict critical hits on this Champion. 

This Champion cannot land weak hits on Champions from the Demonspawn Faction.
skills.name: Demon Slayer [P]
